name: project
text:
How often do you have trouble wrapping up the final details of a
project, once the challenging parts have been done?

name: order
text:
How often do you have difficulty getting things in order when you
have to do a task that requires organization?

name: remember
text:
How often do you have problems remembering appointments or
obligations?

name: delay
text:
When you have a task that requires a lot of thought, how often do
you avoid or delay getting started?

name: fidget
text:
How often do you fidget or squirm with your hands or feet when you
have to sit down for a long time?

name: over-active
text: How often do you feel overly active and compelled to do things, like you were driven by a motor?

name: part-b
text: Congrats! You are done with Part A. Press Next to start with Part B.

name: mistakes
text: How often do you make careless mistakes when you have to work on a boring or difficult project?

name: attention
text:
How often do you have difficulty keeping your attention when you are
doing boring or repetitive work?

name: concentrate
text:
How often do you have difficulty concentrating on what people say to
you, even when they are speaking to you directly?

name: misplace
text:
How often do you misplace or have difficulty finding things at home or
at work?

name: distracted
text: How often are you distracted by activity or noise around you?

name: leave
text: How often do you leave your seat in meetings or other situations in which you are expected to remain seated?

name: restless
text: How often do you feel restless or fidgety?

name: unwind
text: How often do you have difficulty unwinding and relaxing when you have time to yourself?

name: talking
text:
How often do you find yourself talking too much when you are in
social situations?

name: conversation
text:
When youâ€™re in a conversation, how often do you find yourself
finishing the sentences of the people you are talking to, before they
can finish them themselves?

name: waiting
text:
How often do you have difficulty waiting your turn in situations when
turn taking is required?

name: interrupt
text: How often do you interrupt others when they are busy?
